data.comment: The big names in today's match at AFAS Stadion have now been confirmed.
The match is underway at AFAS Stadion.
In the minute 35, Issa Kabore (Mechelen) has received a yellow card from Lawrence Visser.
The first half has been concluded at AFAS Stadion.
The second-half is underway at AFAS Stadion.
In the minute 53, Goal! Siemen Voet gives Mechelen a 1-0 lead.
William Togui with an assist there.
He's off! Issa Kabore is shown a second yellow card.
In the minute 62, Jovan Stojanovic is replacing Petar Golubovic for the away team.
Goal! Michiel Jonckheere equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
Great play from Gilles Dewaele to set up the goal.
In the minute 71, Nikola Storm is on a sub for Gustav Engvall for Mechelen.
Yves Vanderhaeghe is making the team's second substitution at AFAS Stadion with Yani Van Den Bossche replacing Eric Ocansey.
Kortrijk's Yevhen Makarenko scores with his head to give his side a 1-2 lead.
In the minute 74, That's a fine assist from Kristof D'Haene.
Kristof D'Haene is booked for the away team.
Mechelen make their second substitution with Igor De Camargo replacing William Togui.
In the minute 83, The home team replace Lucas Bijker with Maryan Shved.
